data.text: Seems a near perfect clone of the original, and doesn't give me an upcoming loss of support warning (so maybe that won't be an issue later?) I turn my Internet off before playing so I get zero ads. I do miss out on online play this way, but I got it for the offline sandbox experience, and online play is only a later afterthought. Works perfectly for me, played it for hours on my first go, happy for more soon.

I unfortunately can't give it more than a 3 because there were so many ads but turn off your wi-fi and it's fine, it does look a lot like Minecraft, but you might get clouned for not having the real thing. Would recommend as a cheaper alternative even though the real thing is only $7, good if you'd like to test out the real game before buying it

This game is okay but there is way too ads and me and my brother tried to play but there was so many ads we can't even see each other for like at least 10 without being disturbed by the freaking ads I do not like it's an okay but if you're going to do adventures or something like do not download this game cuz this is not for you!!! that's just me!! That's why I give 3 stars but I would give it 3in a half if I could!!!

Seems like a good game, but I can't really say for sure because every 15 seconds another ad interrupts, and then it sends me back to the loading screen. I wasn't even able to look at the settings without ads interrupting. If you are looking for a game to play then don't download this one. If you are looking for advertisement then this is the one you want.

I love how crazy how good it actually is. I just downloaded a random thing to use for a 3d graph for drawing. But when I opened it to us it it's was just like minecraft (had minecraft before just deleted it by accident). Three stars not for the ads cause I can live with them, but for the fact that every time I click out of them it brings me back to the loading screen kinda obnoxious

It looks like Minecraft with some odd textures for things like stone. The only reason for the poor review is the ads. First time I used it, I played for a few hours without any ads, but ever since I have been getting about an ad a minute. I think it would be better if they set it up where you have a set number of ads when you start a new world, come back from a different screen, or open the command bar. If that doesn't happen, I might declare the game unplayable. 7/8/2022. Deleting. Unplayable.

Overall, its a great game. They tried to be original and add some new textures, but it's clear that this is a version of the 0.14 version of minecraft pocket edition. Nothing wrong with the game, apart from ads every 60 seconds. Please fix the ads. They are not even simple ads as a matter of fact, they are actually 3-5 staged ads, where the ad plays, you click the "x" button, but then a popup of the same game the ad is going for appears. You click "x" on it too, same thing happens. Pls fix this.

This game is super fun and looks exactly like minecraft. It is also a super simple and easy game to use. The problem is that there's multiplayer mode but its hard because everytime my friend joins a game, the server doesn't pop up neither can you friend each other. One time me and my friend were playing but everytime The owner of the server gets an ad, you would disconnect. Not to mention but theres many ads which is super annoying, even in the actual game theres ads. Please remove ads in games.

there's a ridiculous amount of ads I watched in this game literally, every single minute an ad pops up, I don't have enough patience to watch a whole ad about something stupid! And what's even more stupid is that everytime I finish an ad it takes me back to the loading screen! It makes me so annoyed and angry when I have to watch a stupid ad and getting tooken back to the loading screen. If you're looking for a fun game without gettinginterrupted, don't download this app, trust me.

This game looked like the real game, the sound were the same, and over all a cheep version. The biggest thing that every one hates, is that almost every single game has adds!! This one is no exception. The adds kept coming maybe every 15 seconds, they were on-going, it was a bit laggy, was pretty horrible. If you want a cheep Minecraft with ALOT of adds, this is perfect.

It would be amazing and I might almost think it is really minecraft, but the ads come too often or even at all. No one wants that. And also there are a few items that don't come up in the Creative items list: Eye of Ender. Theres no point for an End Portal if there are none of these. If you could change these that would be awsome! Thanks!

This game constantly interrupts you with the same ads over and over every 30 seconds. And most of those ads don't end. You have to exit the game and start over only to have to have the same ads pop again. You spend more time trying to get rid of the ads than you do actually playing the game. I only play it because my daughter loves it. It'll be ok if the ads appear every 5 minutes and gave you the option to press X to end the ad.

I used to play free Minecraft games like this, but this is definitely the worst one that I experienced. It always starts glitching every couple of minutes which isn't as bad, but then it'll start glitching every couple of seconds. It has gotten so bad that I had to log out of the game which made my entire device malfunction for minutes straight. It also has a lot of ads every single second. No wonder the real Minecraft requires payment. :/

Another Minecraft ripoff with stolen screenshots for marketing, but that is not the problem. I don't usually mind there being ads in games, but the way this game incorporates them is horrendous. It pops up every few minutes, and it is especially difficult when playing in multi-player. If you're in you're friends server, and they get an ad, you're automatically disconnected. It is really frustrating and makes the game unplayable. Spend a few dollars and get the actual Minecraft, if you can.

The game doesn't deserve all the hate it gets. Sure there's ads, but you can fix that with airplane mode. It doesn't have the same stuff Minecraft does, but that's because it's a knock off. You can't download a knock off and get upset that's what you got. Plus, it's a quality app, even if the textures are a little goofy :)

It's a really good game and it doesn't deserve all the hate it gets,yeah there's adds but that can be fixed with airplane mode and the textures are great for a knock off and the thing is yeah the pictures for the game don't match but you can still make cool things kinda like it and as a player that has been playing for 3 years it's way better then what it used to be so at least give it a try!

I would like to give this app two stars the reason behind this is that THE ADS. The ads are the biggest problem in here because whenever I play this game a ad pops in between and then the LOADING then second problem in here. This game takes ages to be loaded (for me) and once it's loaded again a ad pops. I am sorry but I am failed to understand its problem 😔 and when it comes to the playing of the game 🎮 its good,I appreciate it but still plz solve the problems as soon as possible 🙏 SOON PLZ☝

My most of the time l play this game. Its a 5 star game and also very attractive but it disappoint me a little when I realise that there is no graphic fixing in it the graphics are awesome but I really hope lf you can add a system that we can adjust our graphics that's all.

Awful game. Graphics: not good, way too many ads, one touch to the middle of the top on the screen, ad. ABSULUTLY AWFUL. If this game went to school, it would get an F in everything. You need to be so precise not to mess up. I was building a house and i messed up like, 10 times. Do not get this game. It is awful. Fix this stuff, and wham bam ypu have a 5 star game. Right now, awful. 1/10 dont reccomend.

It seems just like minecraft but it's hard to tell.. I haven't even been able to empty my starting chest into my inventory because I've had to sit through 10 ads!!! I'm sorry, but the ads are insane for this game! I'm not opposed to ads. I play games with ads all of the time but this is absolutely ridiculous!

I like it cuz it has the same blocks as mc but the ads are pissing me off. They randomly trigger while I build. It gets annoying real quick and don't get me started on how long it takes for another ad to pop up again. Solid mc ripoff overall but the ads are just the problem.

This game is exactly like minecraft. I like the graphics and everything but there are way to many ads. Once I opened the game it showed an ad and the game kinda glitches. So the one thing I ask is to make less ads because otherwise everything else is pretty cool.

This is a COMPLETE rip off of minecraft. Every time I want to do something there is an add. ANOTHER ADD. This is a game full of adds. NOTHING BUT ADDS. Adds adds adds is all I see. ITS STUPID! Rip off of minecraft, far to many adds, and that is why I rate this a ONE star rievew. I hope this helps others to not get this game like...EVER! Also anything realistic is fake. The only reason I downloaded it in the first place is for the cool realistic features. But there isn't any. Hope this helps! 😊♥

It's a 1 because it's kinda good but there are too many ads after 15 seconds a ad will come and there is like a little ad thing on the side of the screen and it keeps moving so it will block the search bar it's the worst I cant even stand it I have a other game like it but it's way worst than this so this is why I hate it or I would just give it a 0 star

It's fun but you have way too many ads, like everywhere I click there's always an ad. Like there is always this ad on top of my screen and whenever I need to click there it always takes me to another website. Then after I have to watch another ad. And it's just so annoying 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄🙄So I'm going to stop playing the game and check back every week and when it's gone I'll start playing again, and change my rating

I rate this a two because it is sticking on my table and the resources etc. takes long to load . Cant forget that when i take off my interent adds keep coming up . I install this game twice but same thing is happening . I would like to be messaged back or someone please help me as soon as possible . It is a good game but please i need the people who made this game to upgrade , Thanks.

There's to many ads and for some reason my horses, Lamas, and some other things are colored black and pick kinda like a glitch. Idk if it's just me that it's happening to but please fix it. I have tried deleting it and it wouldn't work.

I have to say that the graphics of this game is good 😊😊 . But there are sooo many ads . After every 2 minutes there is an ad .. That's furious 🤬🤬🤬. I request to the onwer of this game to not give any type of ads while anyone else is playing this game!!!! Please fix this problem...!!! , It's really nice but there are sooo many ads ..... FIX IT ,😡😡😡😠😡🔥🔥

Amazing, like the original. Just turn on airplane mode for no ads, also the hunger bar goes down way to fast. And the version doesn't get updated, a few items missing from the MC new updates. Some glitches, Can't use commands because no chat. Also I can't install alot of Worlds because this doesn't update, Other then all of those things this game is Amazing! 3/5

Off brand Minecraft bro, I wasn't able to play it at all cause of all the ads Broski's, like bro if you want an app for just straight ads then here you go, but if you want the actual game, then just download Minecraft bozo, yea it's a couple bucks but it's worth it, trust me. If you can't get it on your phone, then go get a gaming console and just get it on your console for like 20 buck bro, or get game pass on Xbox and get it for free same with PlayStation, like come on guys think about it lol.

To many ads and when I try to get my inventory in the top bars I will not be able to get them because there is ads at the top of the screen other than that the game is amazing and I feel like I am playing real minecraft but for free.
It's a really good replica of the minecraft app and it's almost the same but just with a few minor things that it doesn't include. One trick is to turn off WiFi and/or mobile data to stop the ads.

I give it a 4/5 because there's a ad Althea time I hate the ad's🤬 and it glitches sometimes 💀💀💀 and also I wish you remove the ad and The glitches and I'll give it a 5/5! And ender man are so annoying because they kept stealing my blocks and I get revenge I kill him and can you remove the ender man it will be good❤️ please add something that like real Minecraft that have✌️ (I'll give it a 5/5 for real if you do dis for everyone I'd love to ❤️✌️) (And who thinks dis is helpful to do it ❤️

Because I Love Block Crazy Robo World so I rated 5 stars. Block Crazy almost known as Minecraft, I don't want to get scammed, In Craft City Loki. I got scammed. If you played too much. It might have a glitch. You can't download if you want to. I think it might be not a worst game, It contains almost too many ads. Have fun

Its super great!! It has so many items and less bugs already and its a offline game! No need wi fi and if ur experiencing ads just turn off ur wifi! I recommend you playing this without wfifi bcz no ads

I'm giving it a two stars because the are no cool structures like ancient city's,desert temple, jungle temple and boimes I played this game for three months and I haven't even found a desert biome,snow biome and infact all I seen is the plains biome and also add new blocks like the skulk sensor and other blocks.add new mobs and to be able to taim Foxe's,it's a fun game but gets boring fast so pls fix it

The game seems fine. Just the ads are getting out of hand! Even after 10 seconds I join in there is an ad. But you can fix it. Turn off your WiFi before playing. And then you get zero ads! Overall, it's a fun game.

I loved the game, and it is beautiful and very wonderful, but there are two bad things that must be fixed in order for the copy to be an exact copy. The first thing is that the villagers, llamas, horses and donkeys must change their appearance to the original, and the second is when I log in with a new account, it is not accepted and puts me in the background. For a period of one to two minutes, then it takes me back to the beginning, thank you

Great app. But I have a few things I wanted to see in the app: 1. Custom Skins. I want to import my own skins to make my skin look fine. 2. Multiplayer and IP Servers. I want to make my 2 friends join my server just for fun like Loki craft, please for real, make this quickly. 3. Team command. Whenever I try to do the /team command, it is invalid and has not been made yet. And then here's an issue, I received so many ads. Like, for real. please fix this, when I would have rated this a 5 stars.

I like it but i feel like it needs more challenges i have completed the game 9 times in hard mode and would love to see a hardcore mode and at least a way to actually connect with other players to make your hardcore world fun with friends it would also allow me to do a man hunt

I love it, just one thing it doesn't let me restore it and I worked really hard on the island's it took me a year to finish it and I'm still working on it please 🥺 let me restore it so l can finish it ,if you play it along time the ads will go away

the game is good i spend hours playing it but theres one thing the ad on the top of the screen is soooooooooo annoying everytime when i want to get something from my inventory or put or get something in a chest it doesnt work it will just say "OPEN WEBSITE" or just teleports me to a website of that ad please fix this and i will consider rating it 5 star thank youu!

If you are looking for a free minecraft this is recommend I know some people are gonna say "ThEre ARe So MaNy aDs" but you can just turn of mobile data/wifi the graphics are not that good but cmon it's a free game what do you expect? But the developers should add multi player or commands. Overall it's not bad for a free minecraft 4 stars is my rating

Its a realy fun game. similiar to minecraft. I did have a problem with adds but if you turn your wifi and mobile data off you can finally play in peace. I was a bit disappointed because you cant really play on laptop. Still I enjoy playing this game.

This game is so GOOD!!!!!I literally recorded a bunch of videos of this game because it's so awesome.I just can't stop talking about and playing this game,it's so great.It's so great,I build my own village.For the ads I turn my game offline.Also,for some reason,when I click emotes,and then click on any locked emote button,sometimes it changes my skin to Alex😅😅.My regular skin is Steve.Anyways I don't care,I just like this game.Anyways see you later alligator.

It is really good but can somebody explain me why there are do many games that have the same pattern literally there are give to six games that have the same thing like blocksun, block craft etc. And also we can't go in the end because it does not come.

SECOUND, WE TRY TO MAKE A ONLINE GAME AND PLAY THEM ADS ADS ADS ADS ADS ADS. BRUH MY WHOLE LIFE IS ADS NOW. I WOULD GIVE THIS A 5 IF YOU LIMIT THE ADS NOT JUST 5 TIME ADS PER GAME. BUT, THIS GAME IS 4 BRODIE 4. ADS NEED TO LIMIT. ANYWHO GRAPHICS ATE AND YEAH, JUST THE ADS BRO.

This game is like minecraft, The problem is there are too much adds/ads, Second it keeps lagging whenever I walk. It's probably better if you turn off your Wi-Fi off so there's not adds/ads, Very awful game.

I like the game and some stuffs but there is a problems like the horse texture glitches and the villager to.there is a lot of ads to liked whenever I play it just randomly pops out.but overall it's a great game

I like it but there's an ad right at the top of the screen and it just annoys me so much. If that ad wasn't there this would get a 5 star rating and the ads are not a problem I can just turn off my Wi-Fi and play.

It's really a fun game I ever had!! I don't need to get money for real Minecraft it has animals it even has my fav map which is flat and if ur experiencing ads just turn off ur WiFi 😉 I recommend u playing this without WiFi

The game is very realistic and it is very easy to get. I rated this game five stars because it is nokhoff tho but super realistic and I has almost every thing that minecraft. I am really surprised by this game u should download this game because the original version cost a big amount of money u can save it
this is great is great end you can turn off wi-fi so there no more add and add more blocks like cherry blossom blocks and that is cool if you add those and is little realistic

I don't like this game because when I try to spawn a evoker it turns out it is black and pink this game doesn't even have wardens or axolotls this game is a bummer 😕 but I can add 2 more stars if you fix the ads too please thanks. By the way this game is kinda fine ya know, it's kinda fine to me to play, but why doesn't the owner of the game usually update the game to get better?

The game is very similar to Minecraft. But one or two things that I've cannot ignore about, the ads are everywhere and it wouldn't stop. Even 10 seconds or more still couldn't get through it. And, me and my cousins are wondering where to change skin cause it was stressful for them somehow. That's all i could say, the ads are SO the main point.

Terrible do not download it don't get fooled by the pictures it's terrible graphic F Ads a lot TERRIBLE there is way way more better games like crafting and building just activate the graphics and boom realistic as possible

This game from what I can tell was stolen everything from visuals to sounds even the loading screen and from what see it is Minecraft bedrock. i don't recommend playing ripoffs and giving money to people who don't deserve it by getting spammed with ads
I like the games,but some of the ads show all different types of tnt,but when you download it,you don't get the different types of tnt.
I mean, I get it, it's a pretty trash game, but not too trash, just juice on knockoff version, Alice gets some excitement about it that they made a game. I appreciate all these people.

The experience was not bad but it was at the same time so every time I was in the middle of a mob mah is stay putting me on ads so all I'm asking you to do is please just take off the ads and please that's all I'm asking bro cuz last time I tried to kill my mob in a add popped up out of nowhere and when I came back from the air I was dead and I was on survival so I can find my stuff anymore and now I'm so mad 😡
It's a good game, but the ads are just so much, and it's frustrating to the extent I kick a chair.so Please fixxxx itttttt...

Seems like a good game , but I'm not really sure because after 2 or 3 seconds and ad interrupts and give me a loading screen and when I entered the horses and the villagers were black and pink. If u want to play don't install this game if u want to watch ads the install this game.

I like this game but I can't play with others and I have to sign in Microsoft to play with others but I can't sign 8n Microsoft this is bad but I can see 3D blocks and some blocks are inspired from minecraft.

Literally just Minecraft pocket edition with a texture pack. Only complaint is the crazy amount of ads but I can turn on airplane mode for that. Also it's funny how the last picture shown for this game is Minecraft dungeons

Bro if you break a block you won't get it like a example break stone with a pick no cobble stone so please fix this. rate 2 out of 5 and it wasn't like that in the old version you could break a block and you will get it but as soon as netheright was added what I said happened so buy the real Minecraft or find a better fake Minecraft game that's better than this and villagers are glitched so buy the real Minecraft NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!(tip)to fix this play creative mode.but the villagers are still gli

This is a good game but the ads are annoying I can't even play with my friends at all when a ad pops up all of my friends disconnect so I have to play alone but it's a good game overall would be a five-star if there were no ads to make my friends disconnect

This is a solid game to play it's not horrible or anything like that is has improved a little bit more sense last year so my experience of this game is very good i like the machines but it need to improve a little bit more so it's good but all in all it's a good and free to play game. 5 Stars

3 stars cause you can't even put text in chat or whatever plus you also can't change the gender I'm a girl and my avatar is boy there's no menu where you can change the gender. But i love it, just pls fix this game. I really wanted to talk to other players, but i can't i only can put chats when it's already night, i only can put chat when I'm in a bed, okay listen I'll edit this to 5 STARS IF YOU FIXED OK??
Don't like the ad's just popping up out of nowhere it gets me killed and I don't like it when there is an ad at the top of the phone when in the game it hides the pause option.
It is a fun game but it is full of ads I could not play because of ads. It's like each and every minute you get an ad. So, I prefer not to play it you should too not play it.

The worst every time it's always the ads when I'm trying to play with my brother the up ads always I press and I've been trying to play this game for 1 hour I hate the ads if there's no ads I will give it a 5 stars🤬🤬🤬

This games sucks you can't even tap anything without the accidentally taping the ads at the top of the screen.

This app is so good It's just like Minecraft but some blocks like command blocks ,animals like camel's are missing and donkey,horse,mule and llama and some fish have the same color. I will rate 5/5 if those problems got fixed
I really like the game but only one prob. That i cannot go to other dimensions like the titanic dimen. So pls. Fix it and make more dimensions rather than the nether.

I think this game is pretty simple as a knockoff. But I just want a tutorial at all costs like my cousin said that this game was very fun but my cousin did not know how to play this game at first so he/she broke my phone.plzz add a tutorial

Upgraded. In the past was a knockoff and now its like Minecraft now. My want updates is that we can make the end portal and add more items so that it feels more like Minecraft.

F you, not you, but the ppl that made the ads. And I'm not talking Abt the ads in-game, I'm talking Abt the ads that advertise this game. I'm going to give this game 3 stars because it is fun but I expected it to be that realistic way and it wasn't but that's okay. And the worst problem is the ads!!! Thank you. I tried to be polite for once.
This is literally mincraft for free. Turn off data and wifi if you don't want ads. If not, there are frequent ads.

the reason I gave it four stars is because whenever I click the top of my phone it gives the chrome app and I am really annoyed by this otherwise it's a great game please fix this problem tho

Worst game ever!!! Controls and sensitivity are absolute trash!! Keeps lagging and it's impossible to craft without an add popping. Don't install this game. Waste of time and network 🙄😒
Decently faithful clone, but the amount of ads make them game near unplayable, especially when they cover areas of the screen that make important things like inventory spaces inaccessible

this game is so cool i mean tridents netherite etc the graphics has changed than the last time I played this game . last time it kinda looked like Minecraft just the lag is it and i will love the game
Very very best game. Best creativity app. You can make it better by having app like buildings for block crazy and paste it in our world.. it's will really be awesome...!
Eh. It's kinda good but there is ALOT of ads and we'll you know I'm am a very ad hater so just please, REMOVE THE ADS NOW OR IM SUEING YOU!!!

Please, add a custom skin so that we can create content using this game of ours and maybe even promote it. Apply a custom skin and also create a skin for the game. It's perfect for me because it has a counterpart in Minecraft Mojang, but what is missing is the custom skin or dressing. Thank you for making this! ❤️
I'd give this four stars review. ITS FOUR, CUZ THE ADS POP UP SO EASILY! And, I do like it, I can buod so many things :}

its amazing beacuse its verry entertaning for me but you really need to fix the adds its verry annoying to deal with it but i like the game its just like minecraft also one prloblem please fix the end portal thx
Best game ever, it's almost like the real mine craft, five stars for me I wish it had furniture though, I hope you upgrade the game so it has furniture.👍

this is such a great game. seems just like the real game. i may have experienced things like the item doubling for no reason before but it got fixed:) this game is highly recommended for people who cannot afford the game as the price is pretty high. i've actually been looking for games close to the original one and this is by far the best. i actually have the original but, i was looking games to recommend people who cannot afford the original. i highly recommend this, once again!!☺️
